recipesJson.name: DragTangPlum
recipesJson.author: KRUCIAL
recipesJson.description: This profile is a Tangerine Plum coupled together by Dragonfruit. This very different fruit combo punches you right on the tongue. That CAP Sweet Tangerine rides right up front and is carried throughout on the coat tail of TFA Dragonfruit then finishes the experience pushing the TFA Plum out on the back note.
